channel.title: Sugar on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Sugar on mattischrome

item.title: Any sugar?
item.description: Not being much of a drinker, I’ve never felt the need to do dry January. Also Ingrid and I sat in a restaurant in Barcelona on January 2nd drinking for the third night in row. We hadn’t got off to that great a start. Well today marks the completion of a dry month: dry January with a two day lag.
